Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23598079] Gram-positive bacteria :Micrococcus luteus(MIC=25 mg/L), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=50 mg/L), Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=50 mg/L), Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=50 mg/L), Staphylococcus sp.(MIC=6.25 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Grouper Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=12.5 mg/L), Vibrio harveyi(MIC=12.5 mg/L), Vibrio vulnificus(MIC=50 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.23598079] 8% hemolysis at 12.5 mg/L , 29% hemolysis at 25 mg/L , 38% hemolysis at 50 mg/L , 57.5% hemolysis at 100 mg/L , 99% hemolysis at 200 mg/L , 98% hemolysis at 400 mg/L against sheep red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Truncated antimicrobial peptides from marine organisms retain anticancer activity and antibacterial activity against multidrug-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Lin MC, Hui CF, Chen JY, Wu JL
